高
Simulates the analog warmth modelled after the Korg Nutube 6P1
CAPの強さ
圧縮音源を高解像度に処理することによって、ロスレス相当の音質に向上させます。
Cider Adrenaline Processor™️
Psychoacoustic Enhancements that makes everything sound both richer and more lively | Designed by Maikiwi.

term.track.settings.option.audio.enableAdvancedFunc: CAP Strength
Changes the strength of the processing done to the audio. (Aggressive may yield undesirable results)
term.track.settings.option.experimental.compactUI: コンパクトインターフェース
term.track.settings.option.audio.enableAdvancedFunc: Audio Normalization
Normalizes peak volume for individual tracks to create a more uniform listening experience.
Audio Spatialization
Spatialize audio and make audio more 3-dimensional (note: This is not Dolby Atmos)
Pre-tuned Spatializing Effect, disables the customizable settings of Audio Spatialization. Spatialization must be enabled as a prerequisite.
Changes the Tuning Profile of the Spatialization. (Requires App Restart)
